channel.title: Authors on Mahika Jogani
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Mahika Jogani

item.description:
I am Mahika Jogani, an insightful and passionate data-driven storyteller with experience in growth marketing, customer segmentation, budget optimization, predictive analytics in retailing and Internet industries.

As a data analyst, I believe that we have entered an era where data-driven decisions give businesses a competitive advantage. Leveraging statistical analysis, machine learning, and deep learning to solve business problems and improving the consumersâ€™ lives have always been my interest.
